name: acl
hubDesc: Control which consumers can access Services
description: Restrict access to a Service or a Route by whitelisting or blacklisting consumers using arbitrary ACL group names.

fields.name: whitelist
fields.help: Restrict access to a Service or a Route by whitelisting or blacklisting consumers using arbitrary ACL group names. This plugin requires an authentication plugin to have been already enabled on the Service or Route.

fields.name: blacklist
fields.help: Arbitrary group names that are not allowed to consume the Service or Route. One of config.whitelist or config.blacklist must be specified.

fields.name: hide_groups_header
fields.help: Flag which if enabled (true), prevents the X-Consumer-Groups header to be sent in the request to the upstream service.
